statements: UPDATE DeforestationRates SET Deforestation_Rate = 5.25, Year = '2021-01-01' WHERE Area_ID = 1;

UPDATE Organization SET location = 'New Location', contact_email = 'new@example.com' WHERE organization_id = 1;
